mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.so_no AS "soNo", a.line_no AS "lineNo", a.logistic_no AS "logisticNo", a.logistic_line_no AS "logisticLineNo", a.status AS "status", a.owner_code AS "ownerCode", a.sku_code AS "skuCode", a.pack_code AS "packCode", a.uom AS "uom", a.qty_so_ea AS "qtySoEa", a.qty_prealloc_ea AS "qtyPreallocEa", a.qty_alloc_ea AS "qtyAllocEa", a.qty_pk_ea AS "qtyPkEa", a.qty_ship_ea AS "qtyShipEa", a.rotation_rule AS "rotationRule", a.prealloc_rule AS "preallocRule", a.alloc_rule AS "allocRule", a.price AS "price", a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.zone_code AS "zoneCode", a.loc_code AS "locCode", a.trace_id AS "traceId", a.ld_status AS "ldStatus", a.sale_no AS "saleNo", a.sale_line_no AS "saleLineNo", a.cd_type AS "cdType", a.old_line_no AS "oldLineNo", a.lot_att01 AS "lotAtt01", a.lot_att02 AS "lotAtt02", a.lot_att03 AS "lotAtt03", a.lot_att04 AS "lotAtt04", a.lot_att05 AS "lotAtt05", a.lot_att06 AS "lotAtt06", a.lot_att07 AS "lotAtt07", a.lot_att08 AS "lotAtt08", a.lot_att09 AS "lotAtt09", a.lot_att10 AS "lotAtt10", a.lot_att11 AS "lotAtt11", a.lot_att12 AS "lotAtt12", a.edi_send_time AS "ediSendTime", a.is_edi_send AS "isEdiSend", a.def1 AS "def1", a.def2 AS "def2", a.def3 AS "def3", a.def4 AS "def4", a.def5 AS "def5", a.def6 AS "def6", a.def7 AS "def7", a.def8 AS "def8", a.def9 AS "def9", a.def10 AS "def10", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.head_id AS "headId", a.outbound_time AS "outboundTime"
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT wsd.so_no FROM wm_so_detail wsd WHERE 1 = 1 AND wsd.cd_type IS NOT NULL AND wsd.cd_type != '' AND wsd.org_id = #{orgId} AND wsd.so_no IN
#{soNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wm_so_detail( id, so_no, line_no, logistic_no, logistic_line_no, status, owner_code, sku_code, pack_code, uom, qty_so_ea, qty_prealloc_ea, qty_alloc_ea, qty_pk_ea, qty_ship_ea, rotation_rule, prealloc_rule, alloc_rule, price, area_code, zone_code, loc_code, trace_id, ld_status, sale_no, sale_line_no, cd_type, old_line_no, lot_att01, lot_att02, lot_att03, lot_att04, lot_att05, lot_att06, lot_att07, lot_att08, lot_att09, lot_att10, lot_att11, lot_att12, edi_send_time, is_edi_send, def1, def2, def3, def4, def5, def6, def7, def8, def9, def10, remarks, rec_ver, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, org_id, head_id, outbound_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{soNo}, #{lineNo}, #{logisticNo}, #{logisticLineNo}, #{status}, #{ownerCode}, #{skuCode}, #{packCode}, #{uom}, #{qtySoEa}, #{qtyPreallocEa}, #{qtyAllocEa}, #{qtyPkEa}, #{qtyShipEa}, #{rotationRule}, #{preallocRule}, #{allocRule}, #{price}, #{areaCode}, #{zoneCode}, #{locCode}, #{traceId}, #{ldStatus}, #{saleNo}, #{saleLineNo}, #{cdType}, #{oldLineNo}, #{lotAtt01}, #{lotAtt02}, #{lotAtt03}, #{lotAtt04}, #{lotAtt05}, #{lotAtt06}, #{lotAtt07}, #{lotAtt08}, #{lotAtt09}, #{lotAtt10}, #{lotAtt11}, #{lotAtt12}, #{ediSendTime}, #{isEdiSend}, #{def1}, #{def2}, #{def3}, #{def4}, #{def5}, #{def6}, #{def7}, #{def8}, #{def9}, #{def10}, #{remarks}, #{recVer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orgId}, #{headId}, #{outboundTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wm_so_detail SET so_no = #{soNo}, line_no = #{lineNo}, logistic_no = #{logisticNo}, logistic_line_no = #{logisticLineNo}, status = #{status}, owner_code = #{ownerCode}, sku_code = #{skuCode}, pack_code = #{packCode}, uom = #{uom}, qty_so_ea = #{qtySoEa}, qty_prealloc_ea = #{qtyPreallocEa}, qty_alloc_ea = #{qtyAllocEa}, qty_pk_ea = #{qtyPkEa}, qty_ship_ea = #{qtyShipEa}, rotation_rule = #{rotationRule}, prealloc_rule = #{preallocRule}, alloc_rule = #{allocRule}, price = #{price}, area_code = #{areaCode}, zone_code = #{zoneCode}, loc_code = #{locCode}, trace_id = #{traceId}, ld_status = #{ldStatus}, sale_no = #{saleNo}, sale_line_no = #{saleLineNo}, cd_type = #{cdType}, old_line_no = #{oldLineNo}, lot_att01 = #{lotAtt01}, lot_att02 = #{lotAtt02}, lot_att03 = #{lotAtt03}, lot_att04 = #{lotAtt04}, lot_att05 = #{lotAtt05}, lot_att06 = #{lotAtt06}, lot_att07 = #{lotAtt07}, lot_att08 = #{lotAtt08}, lot_att09 = #{lotAtt09}, lot_att10 = #{lotAtt10}, lot_att11 = #{lotAtt11}, lot_att12 = #{lotAtt12}, edi_send_time = #{ediSendTime}, is_edi_send = #{isEdiSend}, def1 = #{def1}, def2 = #{def2}, def3 = #{def3}, def4 = #{def4}, def5 = #{def5}, def6 = #{def6}, def7 = #{def7}, def8 = #{def8}, def9 = #{def9}, def10 = #{def10}, remarks = #{remarks}, rec_ver = #{recVer} + 1, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, outbound_time = #{outboundTime} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM wm_so_detail a LEFT JOIN wm_so_header wsh ON wsh.so_no = a.so_no AND wsh.org_id = a.org_id
a.del_flag = '0' AND (wsh.intercept_status = '10' OR wsh.intercept_status = '20') AND a.status != '00' AND a.status != '90' AND a.org_id = #{orgId} AND a.so_no IN
#{soNo}
ORDER BY a.line_no
